refnamediv.refpurpose: Serializes vector of triples into a session, in RDF/XML syntax.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Serializes vector of triples into a session, in TURTLE syntax. In current version, every triple is printed in separate top-level record (say, in rdf:Description tag), without any pretty-print or nesting optimization.

refsect2.title: print_top_level
refsect2.para: zero if only rdf:Description tags should be written, non-zero if the rdf:RDF top-level element should also be written

refsect2.title: ses
refsect2.para: an output stream in server default encoding
